course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website belongs to Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering, which offers an extensive list of undergraduate and postgraduate programs heavily focused on engineering, computer science, artificial intelligence, data science, robotics, and other highly technical fields, clearly indicating a primary need for programming and technical skill enhancement.
